# Ignore user-specific files and IDE settings
.vs/
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# VS Code settings (optional)
.vscode/

# Ignore build results
bin/
obj/

# Ignore Rider IDE files
.idea/

# Ignore database and EF Core artifacts
*.db
*.mdf
*.ldf
*.sqlite
*.bak

# Ignore Entity Framework migrations if generated dynamically
Migrations/

# Ignore temporary files
*.tmp
*.log
*.vsidx

# Ignore test results
TestResults/

# Ignore coverage reports
coverage/
*.coverage
*.coveragexml

# Ignore NuGet packages and tools
*.nupkg
packages/
.nuget/

# Ignore generated files from gRPC
**/obj/**/*.cs
**/GrpcContracts/*.cs
**/Protos/*.cs

# Ignore Docker artifacts (optional)
docker-compose.override.yml
*.dockerfile

# Ignore environment-specific files
.env
*.secret
secrets.json

# Ignore ReSharper cache
_ReSharper*/
*.DotSettings.user
